fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-steal someone’s ability at night
-Deposit your stolen abilities at the bank

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, The Bank (2907) must also spawn
-Your target will have their ability stolen, roleblocking them until they get it back
-If your target stays home, they will be notified that they are being robbed and your ability will fail and will learn who you are
-You cannot steal from someone more than once
-If you are attacked, your attacker gets all the abilities you currently have stolen
-Attempting to deposit more than 3 abilities to the bank will kill you with an overkill attack that bypasses protection
-A robbed player may still visit
-If a player that you robbed visits you, they get their ability back
-You can’t be jailed by anything
-You may use your ability while dead, but it gains a 2 night cooldown

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 3 unique abilities in the bank by the end of the game
